description: Advances from a bustling town to a veritable metropolis, full of the wonders of modern technology. This is the Athenian city phase, where metal gathering rates are boosted because of the 'Silver Owls' bonus.
tooltip: Advance to Imperial Phase, which unlocks more structures and units. Territory radius for Civic Centers, Vision and Hit Points for all Structures increased by +25%. Silver Owls civ bonus grants an extra +10% metal gather rate to all workers.
